title: Heritage contained in any Act or any instrument made under an Act and relating
heading: 1. (1) This Order may be cited as the Marine Environment (Transfer of
text_raw:
1. (1) This Order may be cited as the Marine Environment (Transfer of 

Departmental Administration and Ministerial Functions) Order 2025. 

(2) This Order comes into operation on 1 August 2025.
text_norm: 1 (1) order may cited marine environment (transfer departmental administration ministerial functions) order 2025 (2) order come operation 1 august 2025

title: Heritage contained in any Act or any instrument made under an Act and relating
heading: 2. (1) The administration and business in connection with the exercise,
text_raw:
2. (1) The administration and business in connection with the exercise, 
performance or execution of any functions transferred by Article 3 are 
transferred to the Department of Climate, Energy and the Environment. 

(2) References to the Department of Housing, Local Government and 
Heritage contained in any Act or any instrument made under an Act and relating 
to any administration and business transferred by paragraph (1) shall, from the 
commencement of this Order, be construed as references to the Department of 
Climate, Energy and the Environment.
text_norm: 2 (1) administration business connection exercise performance execution function transferred article 3 transferred department climate energy environment (2) reference department housing local government heritage contained act instrument made act relating administration business transferred paragraph (1) shall commencement order construed reference department climate energy environment

title: Heritage contained in any Act or any instrument made under an Act and relating
heading: 3. (1) The functions vested in the Minister for Housing, Local Government
text_raw:
3. (1) The functions vested in the Minister for Housing, Local Government 

and Heritage – 

(a) 

by or under the Acts specified in Part 1 of the Schedule, and 

(b) under the Regulations specified in Part 2 of the Schedule 

are transferred to the Minister for Climate, Energy and the Environment. 

(2) References to the Minister for Housing, Local Government and Heritage 
contained in any Act or instrument made under such Act and relating to any 
functions transferred by this Article shall, from the commencement of this Order, 
be construed as references to the Minister for Climate, Energy and the 
Environment.
text_norm: 3 (1) function vested minister housing local government heritage - (a) act specified part 1 schedule (b) regulation specified part 2 schedule transferred minister climate energy environment (2) reference minister housing local government heritage contained act instrument made act relating function transferred article shall commencement order construed reference minister climate energy environment

title: Heritage contained in any Act or any instrument made under an Act and relating
heading: 4. Where, immediately before the commencement of this Order, any legal
text_raw:
4. Where, immediately before the commencement of this Order, any legal 
proceedings are pending to which the Minister for Housing, Local Government 
and Heritage is a party and the proceedings have reference to any function 
transferred by this Order to the Minister for Climate, Energy and the 
Environment, the name of the Minister for Climate, Energy and the Environment 
shall, in so far as the proceedings relate to any function transferred by this Order, 
be substituted in the proceedings for that of the Minister for Housing, Local 
Government and Heritage or added in the proceedings, as may be appropriate, 
and the proceedings shall not abate by reason of such substitution. 

Notice of the making of this Statutory Instrument was published in 
"Iris Oifigiúil" of 25th July, 2025. 

 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 [390] 3
text_norm: 4 immediately commencement order legal proceeding pending minister housing local government heritage party proceeding reference function transferred order minister climate energy environment name minister climate energy environment shall far proceeding relate function transferred order substituted proceeding minister housing local government heritage added proceeding may appropriate proceeding shall abate reason substitution notice making statutory instrument published iris oifigiuil 25th july 2025 390 3

title: Heritage contained in any Act or any instrument made under an Act and relating
heading: 5. Anything commenced before the commencement of this Order by or
text_raw:
5. Anything commenced before the commencement of this Order by or 
under the authority of the Minister for Housing, Local Government and Heritage 
may, in so far as it relates to any functions transferred by this Order to the 
Minister for Climate, Energy and the Environment, be carried on or completed 
on or after such commencement by the Minister for Climate, Energy and the 
Environment.
text_norm: 5 anything commenced commencement order authority minister housing local government heritage may far relates function transferred order minister climate energy environment carried completed commencement minister climate energy environment

title: Heritage contained in any Act or any instrument made under an Act and relating
heading: 6. Every document (including any certificate or licence) granted or made in
text_raw:
6. Every document (including any certificate or licence) granted or made in 
the performance of a function transferred by this Order shall, if and in so far as 
it was operative immediately before the commencement of this Order, have 
effect from such commencement as if it had been granted or made by the 
Minister for Climate, Energy and the Environment.
text_norm: 6 every document (including certificate licence) granted made performance function transferred order shall far operative immediately commencement order effect commencement granted made minister climate energy environment

title: Heritage contained in any Act or any instrument made under an Act and relating
heading: 7. References to the Minister for Housing, Local Government and Heritage
text_raw:
7. References to the Minister for Housing, Local Government and Heritage 
contained in the constitution of any company and relating to any function 
transferred by this Order shall, from the commencement of this Order, be 
construed as references to the Minister for Climate, Energy and the Environment.
text_norm: 7 reference minister housing local government heritage contained constitution company relating function transferred order shall commencement order construed reference minister climate energy environment

title: Heritage contained in any Act or any instrument made under an Act and relating
heading: 8. (1) All property, rights and liabilities held, enjoyed or incurred before the
text_raw:
8. (1) All property, rights and liabilities held, enjoyed or incurred before the 
commencement of this Order by the Minister for Housing, Local Government 
and Heritage, in connection with the functions transferred by this Order are 
transferred to the Minister for Climate, Energy and the Environment and, 
accordingly, without any further conveyance, transfer or assignment, on such 
commencement – 

(a) 

(b) 

(c) 

that property, both real and personal, vests in the Minister for 
Climate, Energy and the Environment, 

those rights shall be enjoyed by the Minister for Climate, Energy 
and the Environment, and 

those liabilities are liabilities of the Minister for Climate, Energy 
and the Environment. 

(2) All moneys, stocks, shares and securities transferred to the Minister for 
Climate, Energy and the Environment by this Article which, on the 
commencement of this Order, are standing in the name of the Minister for 
Housing, Local Government and Heritage shall, on the request of the Minister 
for Climate, Energy and the Environment, be transferred into the name of the 
Minister for Climate, Energy and the Environment. 

 
 
 
 
 
 4 [390]

title: Heritage contained in any Act or any instrument made under an Act and relating
heading: Dumping at Sea Act 1996 (No. 14 of 1996)
text_raw:
